title: Combinatorial Optimization
subtitle: Solving discrete optimization problems efficiently using combinatorial techniques

topics.title: Introduction to Combinatorial Optimization
topics.description: Definition, real-world applications, and complexity classes (P, NP, NP-Hard, NP-Complete).

topics.title: Graph Theory Basics
topics.description: Graphs, trees, matchings, and cuts relevant to optimization.

topics.title: Greedy Algorithms
topics.description: Principles of greedy methods, activity selection, and Kruskal/Prim algorithms.

topics.title: Dynamic Programming
topics.description: DP approach to shortest paths, knapsack, and matrix chain multiplication.

topics.title: Linear Programming
topics.description: Formulating LP problems, simplex method, and duality theory.

topics.title: Network Flows
topics.description: Max flow-min cut theorem, Ford-Fulkerson algorithm, and applications.

topics.title: Integer Programming
topics.description: Formulations and solving integer linear programs with branch and bound.

topics.title: Approximation Algorithms
topics.description: Design and analysis of algorithms for NP-hard problems with provable guarantees.
